metadata.synopsis: The Gondian worker spots that one of the kill switches got dropped and she freaks out.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to -271; 8; -147 in CTY_Main_A and trigger the dialog, and choose to fight the guards. In the fight kill S_LOW_BaneiteOfficer02_de084b09-99c6-426e-9159-f692d180d418. She willd drop the dead man's switch, and initiate this dialog.

1.text: No! The Motivator - deactivate it, hurry!
